content: the middle and push back in at the arrowheads 5 times in the order of your choice bring needle back to front from the middle one more time when star is completed step 2 weave needle over one point and under the next always going in the same direction continue weaving around until the eye looks like a circle and not a star you will be going over a point the first time around and then under the same point the next time cut and knot the yarn inside the hat step 1 step 2 under over over start under over end julivia com © julivia all rights reserved tah nogard
